scripts.dev: concurrently -n "CERBOS,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "blue,yellow,green" "npm run dev:cerbos" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.restart:cerbos: npm run stop:cerbos && npm run start:cerbos
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint:all: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.clean: rimraf backend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/.next frontend/node_modules node_modules
